title: What font is this? Please help.
content:
Hello,

I've been searching for the font on Anya Hindmarch's 'I'm not a plastic bag' bag.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023011822im_/http:/typophile.com/files/plastic_bag_0620_6570.jpg)

If anyone can help me, I'd really appreciate it.

Thanks.

In case you can't see the photo, here's a link:  
 [http://img.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2007/04\_02/anya2404\_468x550.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023011822/http:/img.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2007/04_02/anya2404_468x550.jpg "http://img.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2007/04\_02/anya2404\_468x550.jpg")
author: jolie33

comments.content: Looks custom, but I hope it isn't.
I think the type it’s handmade.
